channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 89-year-old comedian recovering after she was randomly punched on New York street
item.description: An 89-year-old comedian is recovering after being randomly punched and knocked to the ground while waiting to cross a street in New York earlier this month.

item.title: California officials say largest trial court in US victim of ransomware attack
item.description: California officials say that a ransomware attack has shut down the computer system of the largest trial court in the country.

item.title: Horschel leads British Open on wild day of rain and big numbers at Royal Troon
item.description: Billy Horschel leads a British Open that featured some of the hardest conditions players can remember.
